text: A stator is the part of a rotary system that does not move. It is the fixed, stationary part of an electric machine (motor or generator). The stator might act as the field magnet (working with the armature to create the spinning movement) or as the armature (receives influence from the moving field coils of the rotor). == Related pages == * Rotor (electric) Category:Electricity Category:Motors
title: Stator
